entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrFan Let's face it. Trump is desperate to win a 2nd term. Why? Because he will face prison afterwards. If he kills Americans thru Covid19 by championing riots to lift a stay at home ban, that's ok with him. It's all about HIM! No leadership in the White House.
